subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: David Lighty’s nearly flawless shooting performance helped the No. 1 Buckeyes turn an early deficit into a runaway victory over the No. 8 Patriots.
snippet: David Lighty’s nearly flawless shooting performance helped the No. 1 Buckeyes turn an early deficit into a runaway victory over the No. 8 Patriots.
